203// ========== FRIEND FUNCTION IMPLEMENTATIONS ========== //
204namespace OpenXLSX
205{
212 inline bool operator==(const XLCell& lhs, const XLCell& rhs)
213 {
214 return XLCell::isEqual(lhs, rhs);
215 }
216
223 inline bool operator!=(const XLCell& lhs, const XLCell& rhs)
224 {
225 return !XLCell::isEqual(lhs, rhs);
226 }
227
228} // namespace OpenXLSX

OpenXLSX::XLCell
An implementation class encapsulating the properties and behaviours of a spreadsheet cell.
